testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say

items.text: The e-commerce website built by Hadi Origin is very professional and user-friendly. Our online sales increased 200% after launching!
The mobile app for our fashion store really helps customers shop easily. The design is beautiful and the features are complete!
The company profile website and online reservation system they built really helps our restaurant business. Reservations increased drastically!
The mobile app for booking appointments and online consultations makes it very easy for our patients. The interface is intuitive and easy to use!
The e-learning platform they developed is very powerful and easy to use. Students and teachers are very satisfied with the available features!
The property listing website and mobile app for our agents really help in property marketing. Lead generation increased significantly!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our website and mobile app development services

faqs.question: What services does Hadi Origin offer?
faqs.answer: We provide complete website and mobile app development services, including: Company Profile Websites, E-commerce, Landing Pages, iOS/Android Mobile Apps, UI/UX Design, and ongoing maintenance. We also provide AI Business Analyzer to help analyze your business digital needs.

faqs.question: Does Hadi Origin serve clients from outside Jakarta?
faqs.answer: Yes, we serve clients from all over Indonesia and even internationally. Most communication and coordination can be done online via video calls, chat, and email. For clients in Jakarta, we can also do face-to-face meetings if needed.

faqs.question: How to start a project with Hadi Origin?
faqs.answer: Very easy! You can start with a free consultation via WhatsApp or use our AI Business Analyzer. After that, we will analyze your needs, provide a proposal, and if it fits, we can immediately start developing your project.

faqs.question: How long does it take to develop a website?
faqs.answer: Timeline varies depending on project complexity: Landing Page (3-7 days), Company Profile (1-2 weeks), E-commerce (2-4 weeks), Custom Web App (4-8 weeks). We always provide realistic and transparent timelines at the beginning of the project.

faqs.question: What is the mobile app development process?
faqs.answer: Mobile app development process includes: 1) Consultation & needs analysis, 2) UI/UX Design & prototype, 3) Development (frontend & backend), 4) Testing & debugging, 5) Deployment to App Store/Play Store, 6) Training & maintenance. Total time is usually 4-12 weeks depending on complexity.

faqs.question: Can I see the development progress?
faqs.answer: Of course! We use a transparent project management system. You will get access to see real-time progress, milestones achieved, and can provide feedback at every stage of development.

faqs.question: How is the payment system at Hadi Origin?
faqs.answer: We use a phased payment system: 50% at the beginning as down payment, 30% when development is complete, and 20% after the website/app is live and testing is complete. Payment can be via bank transfer, e-wallet, or other agreed methods.

faqs.question: Is there a maintenance package after the website/app is finished?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide monthly maintenance packages that include: content updates, routine backups, security monitoring, technology updates, and technical support. Maintenance packages are optional but highly recommended to maintain optimal performance.

faqs.question: Does the price include domain and hosting?
faqs.answer: Development price is separate from domain and hosting. However, we will help with domain/hosting setup and configuration. We can also recommend hosting providers that suit your needs and budget, or you can use your own hosting.
